name: The 6th International Conference on Control and Computer Vision
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be double blind reviewed by program committee and technical committee, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the ACM International Conference Proceedings Proceedings (ISBN number: 979-8-4007-1804-5), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
organizers: Tianjin University of Technology and Education, China
